package main

//go:generate helpflagtopkgdoc

import (
	"flag"
	"fmt"
	"os"
)

func main() {
	fs := flag.NewFlagSet(os.Args[0], flag.ContinueOnError)
	fs.Usage = func() {
		fmt.Fprintf(os.Stderr, `
This is our package doc

Very simple really
`[1:])
	}
	switch err := fs.Parse(os.Args[1:]); err {
	case flag.ErrHelp:
		os.Exit(2)
	default:
		panic(err)
	}
}
